Pre-Mainnet Refunds

January 10, 2020

Thanks for trusting us.

With the news that mainnet is fast approaching and recent changes that remove the need for staking providers to take custody, we have decided to process refunds immediately. Note, these transactions account for all public deposits. Everyone will be welcome to stake with us on mainnet!
